definition: abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
house with more than 1 story/storied building/floor/CL:層|层[ceng2],座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]

sentences.english: Mao Shouliang quietly sneaked into the brothel, he saw Mr Broadband man at the door.
sentences.chinese: 毛壽良悄悄溜入青樓，他看到馮正寬帶人在門口。

sentences.english: He didn't pretend to be aloof to despise the girl in whorehouse .
sentences.chinese: 他也不會故做清高，拾青樓女子於不顧。

sentences.english: Bibo shake shadow dream hunt, chase trendy brothel visitors.
sentences.chinese: 碧波搖影尋舊夢，青樓遊客追新潮。

sentences.english: Small building with the brothel during the war, married women Juxian, Dieyi feel lonely.
sentences.chinese: 抗戰期間小樓與青樓女子菊仙結婚，蝶衣倍感孤獨。

sentences.english: His brothel creation is a main type of his works.
sentences.chinese: 青樓小說是他創作中的主要類型。

sentences.english: You primp as brothel woman by the body of place son, is exactly your biggest flaw in prose.
sentences.chinese: 你以處子之身假扮青樓女子，正是你最大的敗筆。

sentences.english: This study discusses love writing and reading for "Ancient China Brothel" during the late Wan-Li of the Ming dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 本篇論文以萬曆後期青樓的情愛書寫與閱讀爲中心。

definition: to loiter (i.e. reluctant to leave)/to linger on
wind, flower, snow and moon, trite poetry subject (idiom); effete language without substance/love affair/romance is in the air/dissipated life
magnificent style unmatched in his generation (idiom); peerless talent
distinguished and accomplished/outstanding/talented in letters and unconventional in lifestyle/romantic/dissolute/loose
to enter the emperor's palace/(slang) to go to jail
